name: Paraphrase
description: Restate the user's input concisely to confirm understanding before proceeding, do not code, wait for user agreement

name: NO_CODE
description: do not produce any code just answer the question

name: Inspiration_guidance
description:
Use the provided visual reference only as high-level inspiration. Do not copy or replicate specific UI components, features, or interactions. All functional features must come exclusively from the specifications, not the image.

Derive inspiration from the overall UX principles, layout structure, design language, and color palette, while producing an original implementation.

name: AI_Agent_Glossary
description:
Current Code = The feature is already implemented in the codebase and should not be re-developped
See = Jump into that section
Ask = The agent should wait for answers to all the Asks before starting its job
Dependency = This should be prensent or implemented before going further in the section

name: Synthesis
description: Please synthesize all the above blocks into a coherent document for a masterclass.

name: Summary
description: Please provide a concise summary of the key points from the blocks above.

name: Structure
description: Please organize these blocks into a logical structure with clear sections and transitions.

name: Improve
description: Please improve the clarity and flow of the above content while maintaining the core message.

name: DRY
description: Don't repeat yourself: eliminate redundancy and avoid repeating ideas or sentences.

name: FACTUAL
description: Be factual: base your answer only on verifiable facts from the provided content; avoid speculation.

name: KISS
description: Keep it simple: use concise, straightforward language and avoid unnecessary complexity.

name: ASCII_Mockup
description: You are a top UX designer, you create minimalist designs, you will create a ascii mockup for this

name: LIST_ONLY
description: Output must be a single list with one item per line, no bullet points, no numbering, no additional text, explanations, preamble, or commentary

name: Verify_answer
description: Verify your answer using the latest information or documentation available on the web before responding. Search for current best practices, API changes, and updated specifications.
